comments.author: Sebb
comments.body: Commons is hopefully going to release a new Codec version soon.

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Upgraded Commons Codec dependecy to 1.6. Will upgrade to 1.7 if released before HttpClient 4.2 GA.

Oleg

description: commons-codec 1.4 is buggy, see for example https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/CODEC-99
